titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Brunei Darussalam
Brunei Darussalam

div.head: Legislation
div.p: Access to public records is governed by the National Archives Act of 1975, revised in 1983.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: Main Office, National Archives Building, Jalan Menteri Besar BB 3910, Brunei, Brunei (Negara Darussalam), BB 3910
Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade: Jalan Subok, Bandar Seri Begawan, BD 2710, Brunei Darussalam.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the National Archives for post-independence documents and the British National Archives for pre-independence records.
